m_szDocTitle: The Australian Patent Office Confers "Graphite Ore-to-Graphene Production Process" Patent Rights
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- August 25, 2016 09:47 ET The Australian Patent Office Confers "Graphite Ore-to-Graphene Production Process" Patent Rights OTTAWA, ONTARIO--(Marketwired - Aug. 25, 2016) - Grafoid Inc., a world leading graphene research, application development and investment company, is pleased to announce the Australian patent office, IP Australia, has ruled on the validity of a process that converts raw graphite ore to graphene.
